means: 补偿，弥补( countervail的现在分词 )
（通常指有力或成功地）对抗，抵消

sentence.Network_en: There were two central and countervailing forces in the life of Nikola Tesla.
sentence.Network_cn: 在尼古拉·特斯拉的生活中存在着两股非常重要而且相互抗衡的力量。

sentence.Network_en: Their strategy is expansionist and im-perialist, and it is greatest in effect, of course, when there is no countervailing power.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的策略是扩张性的、带有帝国主义特色，当没有抗衡力量的时候自然也就被发挥到了极致。

sentence.Network_en: Two countervailing factors, it is argued, will tend to support the dollar.
sentence.Network_cn: 据认为, 有两个抵消因素将支撑美元的地位.

entry.def: A countervailing force, power, or opinion is one which is of equal strength to another one but is its opposite or opposes it.

example.ex: Their strategy is expansionist and imperialist, and it is greatest in effect, of course, when there is no countervailing power...
example.tran: 他们的策略是扩张性的、带有帝国主义特色，当没有抗衡力量的时候自然也就被发挥到了极致。

example.ex: There were two central and countervailing forces in the life of Nikola Tesla.
example.tran: 在尼古拉·特斯拉的生活中存在着两股非常重要而且相互抗衡的力量。

means.word_mean: 2. acting against with equal force or influence

auth_sentence.content: Disbelief creates a countervailing hunger for meaning and order.
auth_sentence.res_content: Disbelief creates a countervailing hunger for meaning and order.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Disbelief creates a countervailing hunger for meaning and order.

auth_sentence.content: The fourth expert meeting analysed the impact of anti-dumping and countervailing duties.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fourth expert meeting analysed the impact of anti-dumping and countervailing duties.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fourth expert meeting analysed the impact of anti-dumping and countervailing duties.

auth_sentence.content: Only when the countervailing evidence becomes unarguable, do we change our mindset and start fearing the uncertain.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only when the countervailing evidence becomes unarguable, do we change our mindset and start fearing the uncertain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only when the countervailing evidence becomes unarguable, do we change our mindset and start fearing the uncertain.
